name: Elise's Peepshow
description:
Elise has a confession, she likes to be watched!
In this erotic short story you play the part of an unsuspecting photographer, called to take some vanity shots of a confident young woman. However things soon take a naughty turn when Elise asks for a favour ...
Will you choose to watch from afar, up close, or take a more hands on approach? The player can watch Elise getting sensual via CCTV, from her closet or take charge and view from a POV position.
Exhibitionism and voyeurism combine in this erotic adult game, playable on desktop and VR.
Core Features:
Take photos of Elise as she poses for you.
Watch Elise having fun remotely via CCTV, from her closet or from POV perspective.
Talk with Elise as she reveals her secrets.
Bonus Content:
Bonus Image & Video Galleries
Bonus photoshoot scenes - take pictures to your heart’s content!
This game contains nudity, explicit sexual imagery, and adult themes.
